title: How tall is Fiddlesticks?
body: I'm planning on doing a cosplay of him and was wondering how tall he is, I'm 6-2 and I'm thinking about short stilts. I can't find anything online, so I thought that I would ask.

replies.body:
Wow! I don't see questions like this in Help & Support very often!

Luckily, we have some very talented cosplayers in our team, so I was able to get some reliable advice. They agreed that Fiddle looks about 6 and a half to 7 feet tall, so short stilts would be a great idea!

Please send me pictures of your finished cosplay, we'd love to see it! ^.^
Wow thanks for the fast answer! Once I finish it I'll send you a picture. I haven't started yet so it will take me awhile, and it will be my first cosplay so wish me luck!
